name: The Legend of Selma
description:
THE LEGEND OF SELMA ia a (dreamy) little adventure game: unveil the mysteries of the ancient mansion and avoid all the monters to survive!

Realized in true 8-bit Pixel Art, by the creators of UNDEAD NERDS, THE LEGEND OF SELMA is an humble tribute to the old Japanese adventure-games from the 80's (like The Legend of Zelda).


FEATURES:

  • 3 large levels full of secrets!
  • 1 bizarre epilogue-level!
  • Original story!
  • Voice-performed Sound-Track!
